page.title: 18Facilities in Llanover
page.content: The health,social & recreational facilities that are available in the village are Social Club:-This was started on 2nd December 1967 & is held in the village hall at weekends & bank holidays.The club is open only to members,who have to be over 18.The social club is a place where members can gather and enjoy a drink and a chat.Games available are darts,cards & pool.Annual tournaments are held.Cups are presented to the winners.Discos & live groups are held regularly.There is a small television room & also a fruit machine. Mobile Libary:-This visits the village every Monday morning. Chiropody Clinic:-Visits once a month. Parent Teachers Association:-Organises social events,one per term. Baby Clinic:-Once a fortnight.
